last_episode_to_air.name: Bones to Pick
last_episode_to_air.overview: Romeo wants to apologize to Angela and Jojo, but they're hesitant to meet with him; Egypt continues to plan her wedding amid Sam's court case and unanswered RSVPs; Angela performs for the first time, but her nerves might get the best of her.

name: Growing Up Hip Hop
overview: Six young people whose families found fame and fortune in the hip-hop industry strive to succeed independently in their own careers without assistance from their famous parents.

episodes.name: The Master Plan
episodes.overview: Six young people whose families found fame and fortune in the hip-hop industry strive to succeed independently in their own careers without assistance from their famous parents.

episodes.name: Season 1, Episode 3
episodes.overview: Six young people whose families found fame and fortune in the hip-hop industry strive to succeed independently in their own careers without assistance from their famous parents.

episodes.name: Boogie Down
episodes.overview: Rumors about Angela’s fiancé and a possible pregnancy stun Romeo. A DeBarge family scandal haunts Kristinia. Boogie’s mom makes a shocking discovery!

episodes.name: Only God and Janet Would Know
Denial Ain't Just a River in Egypt
Empire State of Mind
episodes.overview: No Limit is in jeopardy when Romeo is forced to choose between two empires; Andre struggles with a secret; Egypt faces a moment of truth with mom, Pepa; Angela confronts Romeo.

episodes.name: Bad and Boogie
episodes.overview: Boogie struggles with a massive secret. Meanwhile, in NOLA, Romeo struggles to diffuse an explosive fight. Pepa pumps up the jam with Salt-N-Pepa to a sold-out crowd while her hairdresser spills juicy tea!

episodes.name: Gossip Girl
episodes.overview: Vanessa struggles to maintain peace within the Simmons clan for her fashion show; Angela breaks down; the hip-hop heirs are rocked by scandalous rumors; and battle lines are drawn when Briana confronts Kristinia.

episodes.name: Let's Talk About Pep
episodes.overview: Egypt discovers troubling secrets when she finally reads Pep's book; a DeBarge rumor spreads; Angela's spotted without a ring at Deja's boxing party; and Boogie gets kicked out when he comes clean to Dame.

episodes.name: Spilling the Tee Tee
episodes.overview: A bomb hits Angela's engagement; things backfire when Tee Tee confesses to Kristinia for spreading rumors; verbal blows are thrown; Romeo brings a sexy super model to a photoshoot and Angela gets jealous.

episodes.name: Sticks and Stones and Broken Thrones
episodes.overview: Bow Wow re-enters Angela's life; Kristina and Briana nearly come to blows; Treach blasts Pepa over the tell-all book; Boogie faces his court date for a second DUI; a shocking pregnancy sends one heir reeling.

episodes.name: Yo Gotti Got the Next Date?
episodes.overview: Angela opens up about her devastating breakup and the pressures of living in the spotlight. Vanessa throws a party to reunite the heirs and clear the air while Romeo gets caught up in a love triangle. Boogie's addiction takes a turn for the worst

episodes.name: The Boy Is Mine
episodes.overview: A love triangle emerges. Boogie's in real danger. Angela and Romeo reconnect after her heartbreak.

episodes.name: Straight Outta Rehab
episodes.overview: Boogie is released from rehab and temptation strikes; Master P mentors the guys on a camping trip; family therapy with Pepa and her son, Tyran, bursts into flames; Kristinia meets her cousin Kyndall, El DeBarge's daughter, for the first time ever.

episodes.name: Tee Tee With The Good Hair
Let's Talk About Sam
episodes.overview: Marriage is on the radar; JoJo is pressed to make a proposal; Romeo is torn between Angela and Tee Tee; Egypt's bikini shoot takes a turn when her boyfriend, Sam, tries to take over; drama ensues when Pepa checks Egypt.

episodes.name: What Heirs in Vegas, Stays in Vegas
episodes.overview: Kristinia moves to Sin City and throws a welcome party. The rivalry between Briana and Kristinia comes to a head. Tee Tee is blindsided when Romeo reveals that he has a secret crush on another woman. Panic strikes when Egypt and Sam run off to elope.

episodes.name: Hard Times
episodes.overview: Angela is shell-shocked when she suffers a major loss; Romeo runs to Angela's side; Boogie betrays his family to avoid his father, Dame; a dispute between the Pepas comes to a head at Romeo's yacht party, where a table gets flipped and fists fly.

episodes.name: This Ain't My First Rodeo
episodes.overview: Boogie and Dame have a meet-up; sparks fly between Romeo and Angela; Angela avoids Vanessa at the race track and pushes her to her breaking point; a shocking scandal rocks Pepa's world when Aundre's past comes back to haunt him; with bonus footage.

episodes.name: The Battle of the Lil's
episodes.overview: Romeo and Bow Wow face off in an epic battle of the Lil's; Pepa feels conflicted about her career and her relationship; on a romantic stroll in New Orleans, Angela and Romeo take shocking steps to move forward in their relationship.

episodes.name: Wherefore Art Thou Romeo?
episodes.overview: Angela and Romeo's double date backfires; Pepa's relationship with Aundre takes a turn for the worst; Tee Tee throws a singles party during which an uninvited guest pops up with a vengeance; Sam and Lil Twist nearly come to blows over Egypt.

episodes.name: Leave Me Alone
episodes.overview: Romeo finds himself in hot water with Angela when he drops out of their double date; Dame confronts his nemesis; Pepa struggles with a broken heart; Master P warns Eric about digging up Eazy-E's death; Vanessa gets a birthday surprise.

episodes.name: Everyday We Strugglin'
episodes.overview: Angela opens up about her past at a Fearless Conference; Dame and Rocky struggle to conceive; Vanessa exposes a shocking secret; suspicions around Eazy-E's death deepen; Briana storms off when feelings about her father are triggered.

episodes.name: Hot Grass Mess
episodes.overview: Angela gets set up on a hot date with someone other than Romeo; JoJo prepares to deliver the surprise of a lifetime; drama ignites at Lil Twist's listening party when Briana spirals down a dangerous path, shaking everyone.

episodes.name: Run to You
episodes.overview: Just when Angela and Romeo take a chance at love, Angela's world falls apart as tragedy strikes and shocks all; Dame checks on a troubled Briana who makes a brutal decision no one saw coming.

episodes.name: The Gospel Of Romeo
episodes.overview: Romeo drops a bombshell on the Simmons family. Panic strikes over a secret engagement!

episodes.name: A Proposal in the Heir
episodes.overview: Romeo blocks everyone on social media and causes uproar, but Angela has receipts; Tee Tee and Tyran join forces to derail Sam and Egypt's trip to the altar, and warn Pepa and Treach before it's too late; Angela plans to squash the beef with Briana.

episodes.name: No Run In The Oven
episodes.overview: JoJo seeks advice from Rev Run. Pepa warns Tee Tee to stop meddling. Ava breaks down over Dame

episodes.name: Serving The Tee Tee
episodes.overview: Angela and Briana’s long-lasting feud comes to a head. A secret marriage shocks all. While Romeo is out of the country, Boogie shoots his shot with Angela. Rumor spreads that Tee Tee is in love with Sam and Lil Twist puts it on full blast!

episodes.name: Yo Boogie Got the Next Date
episodes.overview: Angela and Boogie explore dating. Tee Tee is blindsided when she runs into some old foes.

episodes.name: Watch Out Sammy
episodes.overview: Sam is shook when he asks Treach for his blessing to marry Egypt. Panic strikes when Tee Tee’s sabotage derails Sam’s proposal. Rev Run counsels JoJo and Tanice while they navigate through their relationship issues before officiating their marriage

episodes.name: Is That The Joker?
episodes.overview: Sam’s proposal goes off without a hitch and triggers further investigation. Angela bursts into tears when she faces tragedy and heartbreak. Vanessa meets with Master P and is caught back in the middle of a major rivalry between Angela and Romeo.

episodes.name: Nothing a Few Shots Can’t Fix
episodes.overview: All hell breaks loose at Egypt’s 21st birthday when drama with Sam ignites and Tee Tee tries to shut the cameras down. Security is called when Briana and Eric’s wife Aaliyah nearly come to blows. Bow Wow shows up for Angela just when tragedy strikes.

episodes.name: Love and War
episodes.overview: Angela’s on the quest for love but the drama with Romeo ignites. Bow Wow arrives in LA to throw JoJo an epic bachelor party. Dame and Boogie clash and the mics come off. Pep’s family war rages on when Sam and Tee Tee battle it out.

episodes.name: Popping Off
episodes.overview: Hell breaks loose when Boogie and Ava confront Dame in a brutal family mediation. JoJo's wedding derails when his late nights at the studio push Tanice to her breaking point. Briana meets with an inside source and uncovers dirt on Sam.

episodes.name: New Chapters
episodes.overview: Rev Run is blindsided when JoJo gets cold feet just before his wedding. Egypt’s engagement party takes a dramatic turn when Romeo and Angela arrive and their feud rages on. Sam takes the stage and exposes a secret that nobody saw coming.

episodes.name: Check Yourself Before You Treach Yourself
episodes.overview: A melee breaks out when Pepa and Treach join forces to protect Egypt. JoJo and his fiancé Tanice battle to the altar, and things take a dramatic turn just before the ceremony. Bow Wow wants to reconnect with Angela and makes his move.

episodes.name: Bring Da Ruckus
episodes.overview: Angela and Romeo’s rivalry explodes across headlines. Angela’s ex Bow shows up. Tee Tee’s rumored love for Sam enrages Pep’s sister Maureen to lay down the law and Egypt’s caught in the crossfire. The pressure of jail time tests the Dash family.

episodes.name: Gangsta's Paradise
episodes.overview: Egypt is ambushed by her family in Jamaica and the battle lines are drawn; Pep waves her gavel from the sidelines and Tee Tee drops an unexpected bomb; Angela and Bow's new partnership ignites; Boogie struggles to make peace with Dame.

episodes.name: The Royal Rumble
episodes.overview: Lil Twist's birthday party explodes into chaos when Briana and Egypt come to blows; things ignite for Angela and Bow Wow when their romantic past threatens their new business relationship.

episodes.name: The Master Demand
episodes.overview: Fists fly between Egypt and Briana and the battle lines are drawn; Twist and Sam go head-to-head; Romeo goes ballistic over the drama and enlists Eric to summon everyone to a sit-down; Romeo's request enrages the Simmons family.

episodes.name: The Setup
episodes.overview: Romeo's sit-down sparks an uproar throughout the entire cast; Eric's caught in the crossfire and Angela puts Romeo on full blast; after Egypt battles Briana with her fists, she's forced to suffer the wrath of her mother Pepa.

episodes.name: Sit Down, Throne Down
episodes.overview: Romeo's sit-down bursts into flames when he enters with Master P and his entourage; the Simmons family strikes back while Boogie stands up for battle; Bow shows up and Romeo is pushed to the brink; Egypt enters the lion's den of Treach's fury.

episodes.name: A Treacherous Heart
episodes.overview: Romeo quits the show and the cast responds. Treach finds out about Egypt's fist fight with Briana and there is hell to pay. Vanessa's battle with her weight reaches a breaking point when Angela pushes her to model for a swimwear photo shoot.

episodes.name: Pop Up, Pop Off
episodes.overview: Chaos breaks loose when a brawl explodes between Twist and JoJo; danger strikes when Angela's stalker sneaks back into the picture and threatens her safety; the Simmons sisters clash over Vanessa's weight-loss battle.

episodes.name: Subscribe or Step Aside
episodes.overview: Stevie J and his daugher Savannah and son Stevie Jr. turn up in the heat. Pepa's birthday party

episodes.name: Don't Be Salty
episodes.overview: Angela's fast moving relationship with her new boo raises alarm for Vanessa.

episodes.name: Her Backyard Is Not Clean
episodes.overview: A shocking cheating rumor is exposed; Angela's new man drops a bomb; Pepa and Tee Tee face off; Stevie J interrogates Savannah on how she's raking in serious cash; Uncle Luke's daughter, Cree, helps Jojo plan a surprise.

episodes.name: Loyalty is Dead
episodes.overview: Jojo and Tanice's anniversary party descends into chaos when Briana confronts Boogie about being a disloyal friend; Lil Twist and Cree clash; Vanessa presses Angela about meeting her new man; Savannah digs up dirt on Boogie before their first date.

episodes.name: Every Woman for Themselves
episodes.overview: Shocking rumors of infidelity run wild; Boogie's attempt at an intervention for Briana backfires, and the battle lines are drawn; Tee Tee presses Shawn to go to couples therapy before their trip to the altar

episodes.name: Nip It in the Bud
episodes.overview: Angela breaks down in tears when her split with the boxer faces public scrutiny; Cree struggles to reconnect with her father Uncle Luke; Vanessa warns Tee Tee about the rumour spreading behind her back and all hell breaks loose.

episodes.name: Light Everything Ablaze
episodes.overview: Cree and her father Uncle Luke face off in a fiery reunion; the cheating rumor continues to wreak havoc upon Twist's party and Tee Tee's on the warpath; Savannah and Boogie's second uncovers their true feelings for one another.

episodes.name: The Elephant in the Room
episodes.overview: Tee Tee and Shawn fire up the cheating rumor when their wedding plans derail; Treach checks Egypt and Sam about squashing the beef with Tee Tee and Jojo; Briana's party spirals into chaos when Savannah calls Stevie J. to break up a fight.

episodes.name: Some Type of Swindle
episodes.overview: Stevie J puts Savannah in the hot seat for her spending; JoJo and Tanice decide to keep their pregnancy a secret; Tee Tee enlists the help of her mother, Maureen, to put a stop to the cheating rumor.

episodes.name: Coming In Hot
episodes.overview: After her breakup, Angela plans to bare it all in a swimsuit calendar; Briana and Boogie's friendship comes to an ugly head; Jojo and Sam sit down to squash their beef, but Jojo's upcoming showcase is threatened when tempers flare.

episodes.name: The Showcase
episodes.overview: A scandal involving Angela is exposed; the legends Pepa, Uncle Luke and Brat come together at the judge's panel for Jojo's showcase; Egypt's under pressure to perform solo for the first time without Sam; Treach steps in to heal the family.

episodes.name: Don't Start The Fire
episodes.overview: Jojo's showcase ends in a melee between Tanice and Sakoya, Jojo Hailey's daughter who exposes Angela's past; Egypt and Tee Tee come to a head and settle the score in an epic family reunion.

episodes.name: Brat Loves Judy: On the DL
episodes.overview: In order to pull off her secret proposal plan, Judy enlists the help of those closest to her and Brat; Brat gets suspicious about all the sneaking around and things spiral out of control as Judy tries to keep her plan under wraps.

episodes.name: Brat Loves Judy: Respect the Legend
episodes.overview: Brat and Judy's relationship begins to crack when Brat's friends Montana and Rhonda face divorce; Brat plans a surprise, and Judy drops a bomb that Deja's moving in; with a secret proposal underway, Judy worries she bit off more than she can chew.

episodes.name: Brat Loves Judy: So So Defensive
episodes.overview: Brat and Judy's relationship begins to crack when Brat's friends Montana and Rhonda face divorce; Brat plans a surprise, and Judy drops a bomb that Deja's moving in; with a secret proposal underway, Judy worries she bit off more than she can chew.

episodes.name: Brat Loves Judy: Coming to a Proposal
episodes.overview: After months of sneaking around, it's finally time for Judy to reveal her shocking secret to Brat; Brat and Judy's unresolved issues threaten to derail the proposal; emotions run high when Brat reunites with her estranged sister, LisaRaye.

episodes.name: Brat Loves Judy: What's Good in the Sisterhood
episodes.overview: After their engagement, Brat and Judy face family members to address strained relations; Brat tries to reconcile with her estranged sister, LisaRaye, over their public falling out; Judy struggles to parent her daughter Deja in the right direction.

episodes.name: Brat Loves Judy: A Word with JD
episodes.overview: Brat and Judy's therapy session leads to a massive blowup when hard truths are exposed; Brat reconnects with Jermaine Dupri and reveals the real issues that are blocking her and Judy's trip to the altar.

episodes.name: Brat Loves Judy: Protective State of Mind
episodes.overview: When Brat insists on paying off her massive legal debt before settling on a wedding date, Judy finds herself at a crossroads; Debra Antney steps in during a girls' night out and checks Brat for having cold feet.

episodes.name: Brat Loves Judy: The Missing Ink
episodes.overview: Judy holds a star-studded event for Kaleidoscope to welcome her empire to Atlanta; Brat teams up with Bella to plan an epic surprise to prove her commitment to Judy and their wedding date.

episodes.name: Legacy Will Not Be Lit
episodes.overview: Treach lays down the law to Egypt when Sam's arrest starts a downward spiral; Twist breaks the news of a gun charge to Mack Maine; Angela's move to Atlanta leads to a girl's night out; JoJo and Tanice's behavior nearly causes show production to stop.

episodes.name: Twist & Shout
episodes.overview: All hell breaks loose at a party when a beef starts and a fight erupts; Twist faces weapons charges in court; Cree visits Angela's new home in Atlanta and reveals a heartbreaking secret; Tee Tee and Shawn clash over rings in their rush to the altar.

episodes.name: Parental Advisory
episodes.overview: Pepa warns Sam to be cautious when he announces that he may be facing some serious jail time; Tee Tee's wedding planning rushes on, but Pepa and Egypt may not make the guestlist; Uncle Luke advises Cree on squashing the beef with Sakoya.

episodes.name: On Demon Time
episodes.overview: Stevie J. confronts Savannah about squashing the beef with Tiny's daughter Sakoya; Tyran struggles to reunite Pepa and Tee Tee before the wedding; YDB steps onto the scene when JoJo gets the guys get together for some off-road action.

episodes.name: The Naked Hustle
episodes.overview: A surprise bachelor and bachelorette party for Tee Tee and Shawn ends in disaster; Treach supports Egypt's music career, while Sam faces serious prison time; Eric and Layzie visit Eazy-E's gravesite.

episodes.name: Thugs-n-Matrimony
episodes.overview: JoJo and Tanice find themselves in a marriage crisis when JoJo's stood up on a group date; Tee Tee and Shawn's wedding plans spiral out of control; Sam seeks guidance from Layzie; danger strikes for Briana when police come knocking at her door.

episodes.name: Breaking Generational Curses
episodes.overview: Briana's arrest spirals into a traumatic breakdown; Egypt's family crisis leads her to reach out to Tee Tee; Twist is under Young Money pressure when she returns to the stage for a big performance; JoJo and Tanice's marriage struggle gets real.

episodes.name: Beef N Pepa
episodes.overview: Tee Tee and Maureen confront Pep about Egypt; Briana's new fling shocks everyone and brings her face to face with Pep at a family party; JoJo fights to save his marriage with a big surprise for Tanice; Eric spills the gossip on his past with Tee Tee.

episodes.name: Let's Elope Now
episodes.overview: Angela plans for baby number two and visits a fertility doctor; Tee Tee and Egypt's rivalry comes to an unexpected head; Egypt rushes to marry her fiancé, Sam, even though he faces serious jail time.

episodes.name: The Wright Way
episodes.overview: Egypt and Sam rush to the little white chapel, but when they drop the bomb on Pep and Treach, Pep objects; Tanice and Sakoya's feud comes to a head; Eazy-E's celebration pushes the group to come together in peace and settle their differences.

episodes.name: Parents Just Don't Understand
episodes.overview: Angela needs singing lessons; Layzie and Treach honour Hip Hop's 50th; Tanice faces off with her father, and JoJo tries to stay out of it; Egypt is pregnant, and Treach finally gives Sam a piece of his mind.

episodes.name: Sneak Diss
episodes.overview: Cree confronts Briana over fiery sneak disses on social media; Sakoya suspects her mum is not being honest and discovers a troubling secret; Tyran offers Sam support as he deals with the aftermath of meeting Treach; Twist finds himself a new crush.

episodes.name: Family Business
episodes.overview: A pregnant Egypt goes on tour with Pepa while Sam stays home alone; Jojo returns to music and asks Eric to collaborate on a song; Aaliyah and Eric clash over Eric's gambling habit; Tiny and Sakoya have an explosive argument over Tiny's love life.

episodes.name: Tuck and Roll
episodes.overview: TT and Shawn clash over their new life; Vanessa gets liposuction; Cree and Briana finally face off over Briana's fiery sneak disses; Twist plays peacemaker, and Layzie surprises Sakoya by showing up to her skate party uninvited.

episodes.name: Secrets, Snowcones, and Scuffles
episodes.overview: Sam switches careers from rapper to food truck owner; Cree and Briana have an explosive confrontation at Briana's party; JoJo makes an offer on a house in Los Angeles but keeps it a secret from Tanice.

episodes.name: Mending Fences
episodes.overview: Tee Tee decides to bury the hatchet when she learns that Egypt is pregnant; Twist turns to God to resist temptation, and tries to find his way back to an old flame; Aaliyah has had enough with Eric's gambling and decides to do something about it

episodes.name: Ice Buck Challenge
episodes.overview: Jojo confronts Buck over his toxic behaviour; Sakoya attempts to mend her relationship with Tiny; Egypt and Sam decide who will be invited to their wedding; Treach suspects Sam has ulterior motives for marrying Egypt; Layzie mourns his mother.

episodes.name: Romeo, Romeo
episodes.overview: Romeo says he's changed and wants to apologize; Sam's case goes to court, and he gets news he didn't want to hear; Eric and Aaliyah finally discuss their issues, and Tanice and her dad clash over throwing ice at Jojo.

episodes.name: Bones to Pick
episodes.overview: Romeo wants to apologize to Angela and Jojo, but they're hesitant to meet with him; Egypt continues to plan her wedding amid Sam's court case and unanswered RSVPs; Angela performs for the first time, but her nerves might get the best of her.
